“ALL the powers of Supergirl. I’m now really super powered, and the ‘price’ I have to pay is torturing you! Hahaha!”

This wasn’t good for Marc. His favorite hero was Supergirl, and he knew that she was really powerful, with invulnerability, super strength, super speed, flight, heat vision…
“…Telekinesis, shapeshifting, teleportation, duplication, time travel, and a bunch more.” Sarah said smugly.

What was she talking about? Supergirl never had –

“She actually did in alternate comic series, or at least they all went by ‘Supergirl.’ I’m surprised you don’t know, since you’re such a nerd. This new author seems to be okay starting out, but I still expect MUCH more power to come soon enough.”

Sarah then gave herself a new set of clothes, essentially a Supergirl outfit, with heeled red boots, red skirt, and a midriff baring shirt with a large S in the middle. Briefly considering her outfit, Sarah made a few changes. She took the shirt and removed basically all of it except for the part covering her breasts, of course including a cleavage window replacing the symbol.

“You there, I know you're loving this.” She said smiling directly at the reader.

During this, Marc tried to sneak out of the house while Sarah was working with her costume, hoping she was too distracted with her new abilities. Sarah, using her super senses, knew what he was doing but decided to let him ‘escape’ anyway.

Marc was running into the open. He knew that it was only a matter of time before he got her, but maybe if he ran into broad daylight, Sarah wouldn’t want to do anything to him in front of everyone. There was a group of teens playing street hockey and their parents talking within sight. If she tried to harm him in the open, maybe it would attract the attention of something that could stop her.

Then, Sarah flew down to the street. She didn’t really care who saw her, in fact, the more people who could marvel at her superiority, the better.

“Nobody move a muscle,” she said as she started to strut towards Marc. Everyone, regardless of gender or relationship status, was rendered completely immobile by Sarah’s dominating sexuality and beauty. “Didn’t even need to use my powers” she thought.

At once, she lifted Marc up by her pinky finger (purely for effect, she could have just lifted him with her mind) and slammed him down on the ground just soft enough to not break anything.

Smirking, Sarah puffed her chest out. “I could suffocate you between my giant breasts.”

“But you don’t deserve that. How about I instead crush you with my amazing ass.” Sarah flexed her butt, lifting her skirt and giving a view of her now rock hard ass.

“But you’re even below my ass, I think I should snuff you out.”

Sarah’s eyes glowed red, and instantly two huge beams shot out. They seemed to have missed Marc, which should have been impossible given Sarah’s extreme superpowers. The person standing behind him and slightly to the left of him wasn’t so lucky. He was turned into vapor, and the house behind him was completely destroyed as well. “Oops, let me try to fix this.” She used her heat vision again, this time sweeping across the horizon and destroying half of the neighborhood, and probably dozens of homes behind them.

“Ahahaha! That sure got a reaction! Okay, let’s do this for real.”

Sarah used her ability to travel through time to bring her and Marc back to before the destruction of the neighborhood.

“So, I said you were below my ass. Can’t go any lower than toes, can you?” Sarah willed her boots away and slammed her toes onto the ground, causing a minor earthquake locally. She used her telekinesis to lift Marc just slightly over the ground, enough for him to be safe, and then unleashed her power. She used her super speed to slam her toes on the ground at a casual rate of 500 times per second. In the blink of an eye, all nearby houses were obliterated and the ground itself was turning into dust.

“Oh wow, that was hilarious, especially since I KNOW you thought I was going to do things normally this time.” Anyway….

Sarah dramatically waved her hands around and turned back time. She didn’t need to, but she did want to emphasize her power.

“So this time, we’re going to-” And suddenly, Sarah tackled Marc to the ground and put him into a body scissors hold using her drop dead gorgeous (and dangerous) thighs.

“Ughh, why are you doin- *cough* this sist- *cough*” Marc sputtered while he still had any air left.

“That’s simple you idiot of a brother, it’s because I CAN and because I WANT to. That’s all that matters now in this world. It’s all that’s ever mattered. If it weren’t for me, the very universe you live in wouldn’t exist.”

Can anything even try to stop her?
14532211.title: all the powers of Supergirl

Sarah gets Goddess powers and takes control over everything
145322112.content:
“Stand down. Leave this poor boy alone.”

It was Superman! Somebody actually came to save Marc. And he wasn’t alone. Green Lantern, Flash, Batman, Wonder Women, and Supergirl –

Sarah narrowed her eyes. “Don’t you even dare. I’m the only Supergirl around.”

Okay, so it turns out there wasn’t actually Supergirl, in fact there can only be one Supergirl, Sarah. Still, there were some of the biggest names and strongest heroes out there.

Batman spoke. “My people have detected major fluxuations in the timeline occurring in this area. I’m not sure if it’s from you, but you better let him go and tell us what you know.”

Sarah squeezed Marc some more, cracking a few ribs and putting him in terrible pain. Marc would be howling in pain, if he had any air. “Yea, that time stuff was all me. I’ve been having a bit of fun with the neighborhood here. I destroyed it a few times to mess around with my ‘big’ brother Marc here.” Sarah, after saying that, gave Marc a bored look, rolling her eyes, and proceeded to let go of him, instead taking a standing position.

Superman spoke first with his trademark confidence. “What? You monster. You can’t get away with this. I’m giving you once chance to stand down and surrender.”

“What, I don’t even get a comment on the costume? I was sure the author was going to put in a reference there.”

Superman had no idea what was going on. Clearly the woman in front of her was nothing to be trifled with if anything she was saying was true, but the capriciousness with which she carried herself suggested she was just toying with the group of heroes.

“That’s because I am toying with you.” Sarah said, licking her perfect lips with her tongue, her presence exuding sexual power. “What, you don’t know that I can read minds? Because I can totally do that.” Sarah extended her leg, spreading her toes and moving them such that her big toe and second toe seemed to ‘squish’ Superman from her vantage point. “You all should REALLY be groveling at my feet right now, begging me for life.”

Superman’s eyes glowed red. “Enough, let’s destroy this arrogant girl.”

A blast of energy shot out from Superman’s eyes, dissipating against Sarah’s cleavage. Taking initiative, Flash speed around Sarah and used his speed force to throw lightning, which similarly did nothing to the invincible blonde of pure power. Wonder Woman leaped into the fray, sword swinging above her head and delivering a strong blow to Sarah’s leg, having no real impact, but sending shockwaves through the air. Green Lantern, meanwhile, was using his powers to make sure collateral damage to both life and property was minimized.

“Haha! You’re all so weak! You weak heroes can’t even pierce my skin. You know, soon I’ll be forced to go on the offensive, and then you’ll all be begging.” Sarah said while being bombarded by a combination of lightning, sword blows, and lasers all at once.

“They’re not doing anything because they’re not trying to.” Batman spoke out while launching a green RPG at her. The heroes, especially Superman, launched themselves out of the way as a flurry of green dust flooded the area. The kryptonite rocket, a special project of Batman’s in case Superman went rogue, was the strongest weapon out there against Kryptonians, and Superman by just being in the same neighborhood felt very weak.

Sarah looked bored, mindlessly drawing into the soil with her feet.

“Oh, you’re all done with that worthless toy? You know, Batman, for the world’s greatest detective you sure are an idiot.” Sarah said, licking her lips and narrowing her eyes. “I have Kryptonian POWERS, not weaknesses. Kryptonite is just some dumb green rock as far as I’m concerned. Now, let’s do this for real.”

Sarah used her speed to zoom towards Wonder Woman, punching her in the gut and knocking her out instantly. The super powered Amazonian’s ribs were vaporized, and she was almost certainly dead. “One down.”

In the same second, she used her heat vision, far stronger than Superman’s and full of killing intent, to turn Batman into ashes. “And two down.”

The Flash tried to run to Sarah and stop her, but he ran into a wall. “Don’t worry about that, just a little barrier I set up with my mind powers.” Sarah, while she was enjoying the bloodshed and mayhem she was causing, didn’t notice that Superman had recovered from the kryptonite rocket and was barreling towards her at full speed. Caught unaware, Superman hit her at the back of her skull with full strength. The punch would normally crush just about anything, even planetary threats, but it only managed to severely hurt Sarah.

“Oh, you should NOT have done that Kent boy.” Sarah said while rewinding time.

Superman, having just recovered from the kryptonite, prepared to catch Sarah unaware and land a punch to the back of her head. Just as he was at the midway point, what seemed to be another Sarah rushed at her and slammed him in the side.

“That trick only works once, then again, you probably don’t even know you used it before. It’s really crazy just how powerful this time travel stuff is. A pity that you’ll never know just how great this is.” Sarah said, but just as she was preparing to get into her monologue about how everything that exists should be a monument to her glory and nothing else, a fist flew into her face at light speed.

“Time travel isn’t fun, it’s a real responsibility you brat.” Flash, from a parallel timeline broke into the universe to stop her. Her constant use of time travel was disabling the timeline enough to attract attention of superheroes not of her earth.

“Oooh, a challenge. Well, not that you’ll be able to challenge me.” Sarah used her time travel abilities. She had always been considered a bit spoiled by some people, so it was in line with her character to just travel back to when the flash was born and rip him from existence (Sarah, please don’t do anything to me, I’m talking about other people here, I’m not insulting you at all!)

Sarah, being a bit too busy with the fight, decided to ignore the author’s sycophantic behavior and continue with the fight. As she travelled back in time, she noticed she was being followed by the alternate flash, who had also managed to take with him Superman from an alternate universe, a Superman much more powerful that any one that was written about in any comic series.

The Flash was gaining on Sarah, and Superman was using a tremendously powerful heat vision that would have incinerated any planet it was fired on (luckily they were travelling through time.) Sarah was actually being hurt, and badly too. Sarah thought that her powers would make her invincible, and she was right, but these alternate heroes seemed to have the right skillset to beat her. It was almost like there was some supernatural force that had cornered itself into defeating her.

Or had it? There was always another way after all. Sarah had always gotten everything she had ever wanted in life, and when she REALLY wanted something, she didn’t need to use force of strength (although she had that in spades) but rather force of will.

While moving through time as fast as possible, Sarah took up a seductive pose. She started to shift around the fat on her body and used her powers to grow out her muscles. Her hips and chest flared out, becoming beyond perfect, as her body took on a look of power beyond what was thought possible before. She was the sexiest, most powerful looking thing possible by her own definition of possibility. Of course, she didn’t become more powerful by shapeshifting, however, she may be able to seduce a force able to give her power.

“Oh, no, that’s not a maybe, that’s a certainty. You think you’re in control over the story, but it’s me who runs the show around here.”

1453222.content:
The anticipation from Sarah could be seen over her face. She could taste the power. She could feel it.

Then she had an audible frown, leading Marc to gulp. After all, the only thing worse

"Who are you?! Where's the other guy? ...Animal Man?! What the hell are you talking about?"

Now Marc was just confused. What the hell was Animal Man and what did this have to do with anything? It would be nice if he could see the other side of the conversation.

"Oh please twerp," Sarah replied. "This righteous jackoff is trying to act like there's a bunch of intellectual implications by the fact that I can breach the fourth wall. I know it's too complicated for your puny little brain to handle, so let the adults discuss this, K?"

Marc shuddered. In addition to be near-perfect physically, Sarah was also far smarter than her "big" brother, able to breeze by most school subjects with relative ease. It only made it harder for him to escape her torment, she was smart enough to foil any escape attempt.

"Or at least that would be the case if the focus of the story wasn't so narrow."

The voice came through the speakerphone, which had been left on as Sarah pondered the gift she was supposed to receive. Out of annoyance, Sarah hit Marc, sending him into the wall, bruised, but still conscious.

"Feel better?"

"A bit," the woman replied, her sultry tone slowly returning as she leaned over towards the phone.

"Then you realize that even in cracking the fourth wall like the friggin Kool-Aid Man," the voice over the speaker began, "that this is still a very simple story. You're an ideal of femininity, younger, taller, smarter, and stronger than your 'big' brother and as long as you exercise your dominance over him and others, everything is peachy."

Sarah only grinned wider, cupping her behind seductively as she bent over, all but giving the answering machine a lapdance. "All the more reason for you to give me that power. Besides, you're not some stick in the mud, right? You like the idea of me completely dominating that bug."

"Well yes," the voice began, "but I like to add flavor to domination. Direct, endless cruelty isn't my thing. I prefer it to have a bit of a...kick, a twist. The targeting needs to be more selective than a universal hatred of everyone or the opposite sex."

Sarah shrugged her shoulders. "Says the guy who writes giantess and amazon stories to kill time."

"HEY!"

"Oh come off it, you know I'm right, and you know that you love this body of mine even more!" Sara's hips jutted with that last statement to emphasize her point, smiling down at the speaker laying on the table. "You like enormous women having absolute power over men. If you didn't, you wouldn't have clicked on this story, you wouldn't have read about my gorgeous body dominating my pathetic 'big' brother." The statuesque woman accented that last second by stretching her body, grinning mischievously as she did so.

"...Yes, you are correct, but I also don't have the ones I write be mindlessly violent. But let's face it, this isn't a grand statement on metafiction. It's not even Deadpool...

"I don't really like Deadpool..."

"SHUT UP MARC!" both author and Sarah screamed in unison. "Geez, he doesn't like Deadpool? That's another reason for you to dominate him."

"Tell me about it," Sarah replied with a huff. "The little dweeb doesn't like much of anything to be honest. But enough about my dork brother. Let's talk about," Sarah added while bending over, exposing her vast clevage. "You. Or rather, how you're going to help me become super powerful."

"Well it'd be outright rude of me to go on the moral high ground, especially considering the interests of the reader, but like I said, I want a twist. If you indulge my...little fantasy, I will make you powerful enough to really start torturing the little brat."

"I'll do it," Sarah answered, "but I can tell my sexy body is already distracting you."

"The typos, right?" the answering machine voice asked, to which Sarah nodded, before walking over to Marc. Her 'big' brother, equal parts terrified and confused, could only gasp in terror as Sarah smiled over him, shooting up two inches in height.

"That'd better not be all of it."

"Hardly," the voice answered. "All you need to do is choose which scenario you want, and I will make you even stronger. Invulnerable to just about anything humans could throw at you. Able to bend steel in your fingers. Leap tall buildings in a single bound. And just for funsies, an extra six inches of height...with the clear brain capacity to make yourself a full fledged giantess if need be."

145322212.content:
Sarah wasted no time making a couple of changes to reality. She already had her dad wrapped around her little finger - but he'd sided with Marc once or twice when Marc had accused her of things. Admittedly, they were all things that she had done - but that didn't matter. Nope, first things first, her dad would no longer be wrapped around her finger - he'd be completely infatuated with her - and who could blame him. Dad was now Sarah's little lovesick, lust struck puppy dog - even though he knew how terrible it was to feel that way about your own daughter. She decided that her mother knew this - and knew that Sarah took advantage of it - but she wouldn't take it out on Sarah. Partly because she was afraid Sarah would turn her attention to her, and partly because she secretly hoped one day that Sarah would turn her attention to her.

Sarah made her mother a lot more beautiful, stronger and smarter too - and made her torment her husband the same way that Sarah tormented Marc. Sarah was now a chip off the old block (if that chip was then polished and refined into the most exquisite statuary ever) instead of the first in her family to act this way.

Marc sat down in a nearby chair. He tried to get up several times but couldn't.

"Hey, what's happening."

"I'm just keeping you there while I take care of a few things. You know your best friend Cindy - nerdy girl whose had a crush on you since the 3rd grade - I think we should invite her over."

"Wait - what?"

"Yes - we should invite her over, definitely. And you know what, I think she's become so frustrated with the fact that you never seem to notice her that she's started to resent you. In fact, I think she resents you a lot, but she doesn't let on because you're one of her only friends and she doesn't make friends easily. I think she should come over and I can give her some gifts to help her make friends... really easy....", Sarah said shimmying her body to indicate just what sort of gifts she was talking about. "Yeah, wouldn't that be fun if the girl whose had a crush on you all these years suddenly became your dream girl and then used that to torture you?"

Marc didn't think that would be fun at all - especially since Cindy already was his dream girl. He'd been completely oblivious to her crush all these years and he'd been crushing on her. Sure she wasn't exactly a beauty queen, but she was smart and funny and his best friend. But if Sarah called her over and worked whatever strange powers she'd gained on her - he had no idea what would happen.

14532222.content:
The speaker phone beeped and then there was a click and then some silence. "OK, where was I?"

Sarah realized the voice on the speaker phone had changed so she looked out across the fourth wall.

"Oh, you're back again.", she smiled - this author was even easier to manipulate than the one who had briefly come in last episode. After all, Sarah knew by peaking at the episodes he'd written in a different thread that the "twists" he wanted her to agree to were benefits for her too - so the last author had asked her to accept a gift and he'd give her a gift. This author, well, he was just all about the gift giving with no pretense.

"Oh, I'm supposed to have demands now?" came the voice out of the speaker phone.

"Demand she stop torturing me.".

"That's not going to happen kid... he, wait - I took away his fourth wall access, how can he hear me?"

"You're on speaker phone sweetie, the last author put it in."

"Huh - must have been a device to simplify the dialog between author and character."

"I've got a device to simplify the dialog...", Sarah purred pulling her collar down to expose more of her cleavage, "why don't we stop talking and you start making me really powerful."

"I'd love to - but.. well, I'm supposed to have demands for you before I do it because of the option chosen."

"But you're an author - you're not bound by the script - you write the script. Don't tell me you can't give me my present?", Sarah pouted.

"Well, no... I'm not bound by the script - and I will give you your gift, don't you worri abot it..."

Sarah had favored him with a wicked smile when he began to stammer his apology and she could tell by the terrible typing near the end of the sentence that she had definitely had the dsired impat. He waz even estarting to mak emistaks in the narritave text.

"Right... uh... I demand that you - tease your older sister too."

Marc looked up. "We don't have an older sister."

"Correction... we didn't have an older sister...", Sarah smiled, "or at least - she wasn't in the story before."

Sarah and Marc's older sister Stephanie had been Sarah's role model growing up. She'd been the most popular girl in school, dated the most popular boy in school. She was head varsity cheerleader in both high school and college. She'd completed high school a year early and fast tracked college. At 24 years of age she was working as a nurse. When they'd been younger she'd babysat for Sarah and had teased and tormented Marc - and it was to emulate her that Sarah did it. Of course, Sarah was much better at it. And as Sarah had bloomed into ultra-womanhood Stephanie had started to become a bit worried about just how much Sarah tormented Marc.

Until Sarah had turned 14, Stephanie was the most beautiful woman in the family - and when your mother was still working part time as a model, that was saying something. Stephanie knew how to use her looks and wiles to get what she wanted from men, and she'd taught those skills to Sarah - and the student had FAR surpassed the teacher. Stephanie had lost more than one devoted boyfriend because of Sarah. At 14, Sarah had seduced Stephanie's 21 year old boyfriend into an inappropriate kiss that her dad "caught" them at, and he'd been run off. That first boyfriend had been Sarah's experiment to see if she was, as she thought, better than her sister. Stephanie had moved away and got herself a fiance - until Sarah visited and he'd been locked up by the police for stalking a 16 year old. The next boyfriend was hospitalized after Sarah teased him into getting too fresh with her and she'd beat the crap out of him. That one made her the talk of the town for showing that a woman could stand up to an aggressive man - never mind that the man in question would never had considered pressuring a woman into doing anything she didn't want to until Sarah had enticed him, telling him she liked it rough and wanted him to force himself on her.

Sarah had then threatened Stephanie that her next boyfriend may not even survive the experience if she didn't move back closer to home - so Stephanie now had a job at the local hospital, where Sarah told her it was her job to make sure that anyone she put in the hospital had evidence proving that everything Sarah had done to them had been self defense. Stephanie refused until Sarah showed her what a new trick she'd learned to do with her fingers and a woman's pussy.

Sarah smiled and licked her lips. "So, my 24 year old sister is my little fuck puppet and I get to show her that every guy who she's interested in is just a toy for my amusement. And your demand is that I take advantage of that?"

"Yeah... I guess so."

"Done"

Sarah felt waves of energy pour into her. She'd felt strong before - stronger than any body builder as her brother had noted - but this was so much more than that. She was a real super woman now - stronger than a hundred body builders - or more!
